page.title: 10Butley Then and Now - Review
page.content: Butley has changed quite a lot during the last 100 years. We visited Butley on Tuesday 10 September 1985 and filled in a sheet about the different sorts of buildings in the village. Among the houses I put down on my sheet were The Shop,The Forge and The Oyster Inn. On the front of the Oyster Inn the front door has been moved and the small window has been taken out and a bigger one has been put in its place. The old roads in Butley were old dirt tracks but now they are gravel and tar. The Priory has not changed as much as the other buildings. The Forge used to have a big archway for the horses but now it is a doorway. The Shop is now used for living in because it closed down 10 years ago.
